member.name: MFMediaKeyStatus
member.summary: Represents the status of a Content Decryption Module (CDM) session key.

member.name: MFMediaKeyStatus.pbKeyId
member.summary: A byte array representing the identifier of a session key.

member.name: MFMediaKeyStatus.cbKeyId
member.summary: The number of bytes in the pbKeyId parameter.

member.name: MFMediaKeyStatus.eMediaKeyStatus
member.summary: A value from the enumeration specifying the status of the associated session key.
